problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, \\frac {AG}{AH} = \\frac {DE}{BC}, and DE = N_0, BC = N_1, GH = N_2, then the length of AH is ()
raw_answer: 解:设AH=x,则AG=x-4．∵\frac{AG}{AH}=\frac{DE}{BC},∴\frac{x-4}{x}=\frac{12}{15},解得x=20,经检验x=20是分式方程的解,故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查比例的应用,解题的关键是学会利用参数构建方程解决问题,属于中考常考题型．
